title: Application Development Analyst
description: Recently joined Accenture as an Application Development Analyst and working on ReactJs project to build website for clients in an agile environment.

title: Front-End Developer
description: I  worked here for 2.5 years as a FrontEnd Developer. I started my journey as a React Native developer in 2018 and developed 4 client apps for ios in React Native. Then, I was given an opportunity to work as a ReactJs developer for a lifesciences client where I was responsible for building a website to show data visualizations for client data using D3.js and React.

title: Trainee
description: I worked as an intern in DRDO in 2017 and learned about various technologies involved in building modern warfare accessories for defense forces. I was mainly imparted knowledge about thermal imaging which is used in night vision goggles and binoculars

title: Trainee
description: I worked as an intern in CMRC in 2015 and learned about various technologies involved in carrying out the efficient work of Chennai Metro. Learned about signalling and communication at the control centre of CMRC.

title: Trainee
description: I worked as an intern in BSNL in 2015 and learned about an upcoming technology in broadband named NGN(Next Generation Network)
